steps.Step 3: Heat butter and olive oil in skillet over medium heat. Saute mushrooms until they begin to soften and brown. Add spinach; cook and stir until spinach is wilted, 3 to 4 minutes.
steps.Step 4: Stir in the ClassicoÂ® Fresh Creamy Alfredo Sauce. Bring to a simmer and cook about 5 minutes to slightly thicken the sauce.
steps.Step 5: Cut a slit in the potatoes and squeeze the sides to loosen the flesh. To serve, pour some of the creamy spinach-mushroom sauce into and over the potato. Sprinkle with chopped tomatoes.

Chocolate Peanut Butter Blossom Cookies.diffusion_prompt: Photorealistic image of chocolate peanut butter blossom cookies, each topped with a dark chocolate kiss.
Chocolate Peanut Butter Blossom Cookies.title: Chocolate Peanut Butter Blossom Cookies
Chocolate Peanut Butter Blossom Cookies.description: These cookies offer a decadent twist on traditional peanut butter blossoms, featuring a chocolate-peanut butter dough topped with dark chocolate kisses.

steps.Step 1: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F. Line two cookie sheets with ReynoldsÂ® Parchment Paper.
steps.Step 2: Beat the shortening and peanut butter in a large bowl with an electric mixer on medium to high speed for 30 seconds. Add the brown sugar, baking powder, and baking soda. Beat until combined, scraping the sides of the bowl occasionally. Beat in the egg, milk, and vanilla until combined. Beat in as much of the flour and cocoa powder as you can with the mixer, using a wooden spoon at the end if necessary.
steps.Step 3: Place the granulated sugar in a small bowl. Shape the dough into 1-inch balls. Roll the balls in sugar to coat. Place the balls 2 inches apart on the prepared cookie sheets.
steps.Step 4: Bake 10 to 12 minutes or until edges are firm. Immediately press a dark chocolate candy into the center of each cookie. Slide the parchment with the cookies on it to a wire rack; cool completely.

Fruity Mini Pancake Skewers.diffusion_prompt: Photorealistic image of colorful fruity mini pancake skewers, topped with cream cheese, strawberries, and banana, drizzled with confectioners' sugar.
Fruity Mini Pancake Skewers.title: Fruity Mini Pancake Skewers
Fruity Mini Pancake Skewers.description: These mini pancake skewers are a fun and delicious finger food, perfect for breakfast, brunch, snacks, or game-day buffets. The colorful combination of pancakes, fruit, and cream cheese is sure to please kids and adults alike.

steps.Step 1: Whisk together flour, sugar, baking powder, baking soda, cinnamon, and salt in a bowl.
steps.Step 2: Whisk milk, egg, butter, and amaretto extract together in a second bowl.
steps.Step 3: Pour wet ingredients into the flour mixture, and mix until batter is well combined and smooth.
steps.Step 4: Heat a large nonstick skillet or griddle over medium heat.
steps.Step 5: Drop teaspoonfuls of batter onto the hot skillet to form 1-inch diameter pancakes.
steps.Step 6: Cook for about 1 to 2 minutes, flip, and continue cooking until golden brown, about 1 more minute.
steps.Step 7: Transfer cooked pancakes to a plate and repeat with remaining batter.
steps.Step 8: Stack ingredients on a work surface as follows: pancake, banana, pancake spread with cream cheese, pancake, strawberry, and pancake. (Each skewer will use 4 pancakes).
steps.Step 9: Insert a skewer through the center of the stack and repeat to make remaining skewers.
steps.Step 10: Dust with confectioners sugar, and serve.

French Toast Mini Dutch Babies.diffusion_prompt: A photorealistic image of twelve golden-brown, puffed French toast mini Dutch babies, topped with a dollop of yogurt and fresh berries.
French Toast Mini Dutch Babies.title: French Toast Mini Dutch Babies
French Toast Mini Dutch Babies.description: These mini custard-like cups have all the flavor of French toast, but are most similar to Dutch baby pancakes in texture. Like Dutch babies, they puff dramatically while baking and deflate just as dramatically when out of the oven. I like to serve them topped with a bit of yogurt and fresh berries.

steps.Step 1: Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C).
steps.Step 2: Combine milk, flour, eggs, maple syrup, vanilla, cinnamon, nutmeg, and salt in a blender. Blend until batter is smooth and free of lumps, 1 to 2 minutes.
steps.Step 3: Cut butter into 12 equal pieces; place 1 piece in each cup of a 12-cup standard muffin pan. Place pan into the oven to melt butter, about 1 minute. Remove from the oven and divide pancake batter evenly between the cups.
steps.Step 4: Place muffin pan on a baking sheet to catch spills, and place in the preheated oven. Bake until pancakes are puffed and browned on the edges, 10 to 15 minutes.
steps.Step 5: Remove from the oven and cool in the muffin pan for 2 minutes. Run a knife around the edges and bottoms to loosen and serve immediately.

Buttery Strawberry Shmear.diffusion_prompt: A close-up photo of a creamy, buttery strawberry shmear, ready to be spread on a toasted bagel.
Buttery Strawberry Shmear.title: Buttery Strawberry Shmear
Buttery Strawberry Shmear.description: This shmear is delicious on bagels, toast, crackers, as a dip, or by the spoonful! Adjust sweetener accordingly to the sweetness of your strawberries.

steps.Step 1: Place strawberries in a blender and blend until pureed. Measure out 3 tablespoons strawberry puree and set aside. Save the rest, if any, for another use.
steps.Step 2: Combine butter, Neufchatel cheese, and sweetener in a blender and blend until smooth. Add strawberry puree and blend until fully incorporated.

Delicious Salmon.diffusion_prompt: A photorealistic image of a perfectly broiled salmon fillet, served with rice and broccoli, showcasing the golden-brown skin and flaky flesh.
Delicious Salmon.title: Delicious Salmon
Delicious Salmon.description: This easy salmon recipe is broiled to perfection and served with rice and broccoli. The salmon is marinated in a simple soy sauce, olive oil, brown sugar, lemon pepper, and garlic mixture for a flavorful dish.

steps.Step 1: Whisk together the soy sauce, olive oil, brown sugar, lemon pepper, and garlic in a shallow dish; lay the salmon fillets into the mixture with the skin side facing up.
steps.Step 2: Allow to marinate in the refrigerator 4 to 8 hours or overnight.
steps.Step 3: Preheat the oven's broiler and set the oven rack about 6 inches from the heat source.
steps.Step 4: Remove salmon from the marinade and arrange on a baking sheet. Discard the marinade.
steps.Step 5: Cook the salmon under the broiler until lightly browned and the flesh flakes easily with a fork, 7 to 10 minutes.
steps.Step 6: Allow the salmon to rest 5 minutes before slicing and serving.

Beef Tenderloin With Roasted Shallots.diffusion_prompt: A rich, flavorful beef tenderloin with roasted shallots, served with a decadent shallot sauce, garnished with watercress.
Beef Tenderloin With Roasted Shallots.title: Beef Tenderloin With Roasted Shallots
Beef Tenderloin With Roasted Shallots.description: A rich and flavorful beef tenderloin dish featuring a decadent shallot sauce. The recipe is suitable for gatherings and doubles well for larger parties.

steps.Step 1: Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C). In 9 inch pie pan, toss shallots with oil to coat. Season with salt and pepper. Roast until shallots are deep brown and very tender, stirring occasionally, about 30 minutes.
steps.Step 2: In a large saucepan, combine beef broth and port. Bring to a boil. Cook over high heat until the volume is reduced by half, about 30 minutes. Whisk in tomato paste. Set aside.
steps.Step 3: Pat beef dry; sprinkle with thyme, salt and pepper. In a large roasting pan, set over medium heat on the stove top, saute bacon until golden. Using a slotted spoon, transfer bacon to paper towels. Add beef to pan; brown on all sides over medium high heat, about 7 minutes.
steps.Step 4: Transfer pan to oven. Roast beef until meat thermometer inserted into center registers 125 degrees F (50 degrees C) for medium rare, about 25 minutes. Transfer beef to platter. Tent loosely with foil.
steps.Step 5: Spoon fat off top of pan drippings in roasting pan. Place pan over high heat on stove top. Add broth mixture, and bring to boil; stir to scrape up any browned bits. Transfer to a medium saucepan, and bring to simmer. Mix 1 1/2 tablespoon butter and flour in small bowl to form smooth paste; whisk into broth mixture, and simmer until sauce thickens. Whisk in remaining butter. Stir in roasted shallots and reserved bacon. Season with salt and pepper.
steps.Step 6: Cut beef into 1/2 inch thick slices. Spoon some sauce over, and garnish with watercress.

Tortilla Chorizo Scramble.diffusion_prompt: A photorealistic image of a delicious, savory tortilla chorizo scramble, topped with melted pepper jack cheese and fresh chives, ready to be served.
Tortilla Chorizo Scramble.title: Tortilla Chorizo Scramble
Tortilla Chorizo Scramble.description: This chilaquiles-inspired tortilla chorizo scramble is a great way to dress up high-fiber, whole wheat tortillas.

steps.Step 1: Beat eggs in a small bowl. Set aside.
steps.Step 2: Combine tortilla slices and chorizo in a skillet over medium heat. Cook, stirring, until tortillas are crisped, 5 minutes.
steps.Step 3: Place cheese slices on top of chorizo and tortillas; pour in eggs. Reduce heat to low and cook, stirring, until eggs are cooked through, 3 minutes. Season with salt and pepper to taste; garnish with chives.

Strawberry Crescent Roll Shortcake.diffusion_prompt: A photorealistic image of a strawberry crescent roll shortcake, filled with fresh strawberries, topped with whipped cream, and golden brown crescent roll halves.
Strawberry Crescent Roll Shortcake.title: Strawberry Crescent Roll Shortcake
Strawberry Crescent Roll Shortcake.description: An easy and delicious breakfast using fresh berries and refrigerated crescents.

steps.Step 1: Preheat the oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C). Line a baking sheet with parchment paper.
steps.Step 2: Place 1/2 cup strawberries and water in a food processor and process until smooth.
steps.Step 3: Combine 3 tablespoons sugar and cornstarch in a saucepan. Add pureed strawberries. Cook and stir until strawberry sauce has thickened, about 5 minutes. Stir in remaining 2 cups sliced strawberries and lemon juice. Set aside.
steps.Step 4: Unroll dough. Place 1 crescent atop another and roll up, starting at the smallest end, to make 4 double-rolled crescents. Brush each roll with 1/2 teaspoon heavy whipping cream and sprinkle with 1/2 teaspoon sugar.
steps.Step 5: Bake crescents until golden brown, 20 to 25 minutes. Transfer to a wire rack and let cool completely.
steps.Step 6: Split each roll in half horizontally and fill with strawberries. Top with 1/2 cup whipped cream and the top half of the crescent roll. Top with more strawberries.

Sweet Berry Parfait.diffusion_prompt: A photorealistic image of a layered sweet berry parfait, showcasing the vibrant colors of berries, creamy yogurt, and crunchy almonds, garnished with fresh thyme.
Sweet Berry Parfait.title: Sweet Berry Parfait
Sweet Berry Parfait.description: Creamy yogurt parfaits make deliciously balanced breakfasts or snacks.  Use 2/3 cup yogurt, 1/2 cup chopped fruit, 2 tablespoons crunch, 1 teaspoon drizzle, and 1 teaspoon chopped fresh herb to make your own version.

steps.Step 1: Spoon 1/3 cup yogurt into a 6- to 8-ounce parfait glass or jar.
steps.Step 2: Top yogurt 1/2 half of the blackberries, 1/2 of the almonds, and 1/2 of the honey.
steps.Step 3: Repeat layers with the remaining yogurt, berries, almonds, and honey.
steps.Step 4: Top parfait with thyme.

Lamb Korma.diffusion_prompt: A rich, golden-brown lamb korma dish, featuring tender lamb, potatoes, and a creamy coconut milk sauce, ready to be served.
Lamb Korma.title: Lamb Korma
Lamb Korma.description: A traditional Kashmiri Korma recipe, featuring lamb, potatoes, and a flavorful curry sauce.  The recipe is adaptable, with variations in the amount of curry powder and simmering time for the potatoes.

steps.Step 1: Place lamb in a bowl and drizzle 2 teaspoons olive oil over lamb; stir until coated.
steps.Step 2: Heat remaining 2 teaspoons olive oil in a saucepan over low heat; cook and stir onion until softened, 10 to 15 minutes. Remove saucepan from heat and add potato to onion.
steps.Step 3: Heat a large skillet over medium heat; cook and stir lamb, working in small batches, until browned, about 5 minutes per batch. Transfer browned lamb to onion mixture.
steps.Step 4: Stir curry into lamb-onion mixture and cook over medium heat for 1 minute. Add water to lamb-onion mixture and bring to a boil. Reduce heat to low, cover saucepan, and simmer until lamb is cooked through and potatoes are tender, about 45 minutes.
steps.Step 5: Mix coconut milk and chickpeas into lamb-onion mixture and simmer until heated through, about 5 minutes.

Pineapple Salmon.diffusion_prompt: Photorealistic image of pan-seared salmon fillets glazed with a sweet and savory pineapple sauce, ready to be served.
Pineapple Salmon.title: Pineapple Salmon
Pineapple Salmon.description: A flavorful and quick salmon dish featuring a sweet and savory pineapple glaze. The salmon is pan-seared and then coated in a delicious mixture of pineapple, teriyaki, and sweet chili sauces.

steps.Step 1: Heat a large saute pan over medium-high heat for 2 minutes. Coat both sides of salmon fillets with cooking spray and add to the hot pan. Cook for 4 minutes. Flip, cover, and cook for 4 minutes more.
steps.Step 2: Whisk water, crushed pineapple, and 1/4 cup teriyaki sauce together in a bowl. Pour sauce over salmon; reduce heat to medium-low, cover, and cook for 2 minutes.
steps.Step 3: Stir pineapple preserves, chili sauce, and remaining 2 teaspoons teriyaki sauce together. Spoon evenly over salmon, cover, and remove from heat. Let stand for 1 to 2 minutes.

Summer Squash Bake.diffusion_prompt: A photorealistic image of a golden-brown, cheesy summer squash bake, ready to be served.
Summer Squash Bake.title: Summer Squash Bake
Summer Squash Bake.description: A simple and cheesy side dish featuring zucchini and yellow squash, baked until tender and slightly browned.  Perfect for a summer meal.

ingredients.name: KRAFT Finely Shredded Italian Style Five Cheese Blend

steps.Step 1: Heat oven to 375 degrees F.
steps.Step 2: Cook zucchini and yellow squash in large skillet sprayed with cooking spray on medium heat 5 minutes or until crisp-tender, stirring frequently. Remove from heat.

steps.Step 1: Combine flour, 2 tablespoons oil, salt, and baking soda together in a bowl. Mix for 1 to 2 minutes.

steps.Step 1: Combine ground almonds and cinnamon in a small bowl; set aside.

steps.Step 1: Place sugar and mint in a small food processor; cover and process until blended. Set aside.

steps.Step 3: In a large bowl, cream butter and 1-3/4 cups confectioners sugar until light and fluffy. Beat in 4-1/2 teaspoons reserved mint mixture. Add eggs, one at a time, beating well after each addition. Add mashed potato flakes alternately with 1/4 cup cream. Stir in lemon juice and peel.
steps.Step 4: Pour into a greased and floured 9 x 13-inch baking dish. Bake for 60-70 minutes or until a toothpick inserted near the center comes out clean. Cool for 10 minutes before removing from pan to a wire rack to cool completely.
steps.Step 5: In a large bowl, beat remaining cream until it begins to thicken. Add 1/2 cup confectioners sugar and 1 tablespoon mint mixture; beat until stiff peaks form. Fold in lemon curd; set aside.
steps.Step 6: In another bowl, combine strawberries and blueberries with remaining mint mixture and confectioners sugar.

Mediterranean Red Snapper.diffusion_prompt: A photorealistic image of two perfectly cooked Mediterranean red snapper fillets, garnished with fresh herbs and lemon slices, ready to be served.

steps.Step 1: Mix parsley, olive oil, oregano, lemon zest, and garlic together in a small bowl.

steps.Step 1: Heat milk and butter until warm (100 degrees to 110 degrees F); the butter will not completely melt. Combine with undissolved yeast and brown sugar in a large mixer bowl. Stir in salt and 2 cups flour, beat for 3 minutes.
steps.Step 2: Gradually add enough remaining flour to make a soft dough. Knead on a floured surface until smooth and elastic, about 8 to 10 minutes.

steps.Step 5: Combine boiling solution and bring to a boil.
steps.Step 6: Punch dough down and divide into 2 equal pieces. Form each piece into a tight, smooth ball.

Apple Butter Recipe.title: Apple Butter Recipe

steps.Step 1: Combine Honeycrisp apples, Granny Smith apples, and apple cider in a large stainless steel or enamel-coated saucepan; bring to a boil, stirring occasionally. Reduce heat to medium-low; simmer until mixture reduces by about half, about 20 minutes.
steps.Step 2: Stir sugar and lemon juice into the apple mixture; bring to a boil. Reduce heat to medium-low, and continue cooking at a simmer until the mixture is very thick, about 25 minutes.
steps.Step 3: Sterilize the jars and lids in boiling water for at least 5 minutes. Pack apple butter into the hot, sterilized jars, filling the jars to within 1/4 inch of the top. Run a knife or a thin spatula around the insides of the jars after they have been filled to remove any air bubbles. Wipe the rims of the jars with a moist paper towel to remove any food residue. Top with lids and screw on rings.
steps.Step 4: Place a rack in the bottom of a large stockpot and fill halfway with water. Bring to a boil and lower jars into the boiling water using a holder. Leave a 2-inch space between the jars. Pour in more boiling water if necessary to bring the water level to at least 1 inch above the tops of the jars. Bring the water to a rolling boil, cover the pot, and process for 10 minutes.
steps.Step 5: Remove the jars from the stockpot and place onto a cloth-covered or wood surface, several inches apart, until cool. Once cool, press the top of each lid with a finger, ensuring that the seal is tight (lid does not move up or down at all). Store in a cool, dark area.

steps.Step 1: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). Grease a 9x13-inch pan.

Shredded Slow Cooker Green Chile Chicken.diffusion_prompt: A high-angle, photorealistic image of shredded slow cooker green chile chicken, ready to be served in bowls with toppings like tortillas, salsa, and sour cream.

Slow Cooker Ropa Vieja.diffusion_prompt: A photorealistic image of a hearty, slow-cooked Cuban Ropa Vieja, featuring shredded beef, vibrant vegetables, and a rich, flavorful sauce.

steps.Step 1: Heat avocado oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat; cook beef roast in the hot oil until browned, about 4 minutes per side.

Cocoa Powder Chocolate Mousse.diffusion_prompt: Photorealistic image of six small, elegant shot glasses filled with rich, dark chocolate mousse.

Turkey Lumpia.diffusion_prompt: Photorealistic image of golden-brown, crispy turkey lumpia, cut in half, ready to be served with sweet chili sauce.
Turkey Lumpia.title: Turkey Lumpia
Turkey Lumpia.description: This twist on a Filipino favorite is a delicious appetizer or party treat. Enjoy with sweet chili sauce for dipping.

steps.Step 1: Line a cookie sheet with waxed paper.
steps.Step 2: Combine turkey, egg, onion, garlic, cumin, Creole seasoning, salt, and pepper in a bowl. Mix well with your hands.
steps.Step 3: Position a wonton wrapper on a cutting board so it looks like a diamond. Spread a heaping teaspoonful of the turkey mixture in a horizontal line across the bottom third of the wrapper. Michigan Hot Dogs.diffusion_prompt: Photorealistic image of a plate of Michigan hot dogs, topped with a beef mixture, onions, and mustard, served in a bun.

steps.Step 1: Place hot dogs in a large stockpot. Cover with water and bring to a boil. Turn heat off, cover, and let sit.

Air Fryer Sweet Potatoes.diffusion_prompt: Photorealistic image of two crispy air-fried sweet potatoes, topped with butter and fresh chives.
